verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> prevailed <S%H5810><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and because <S%H6440><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> them the dens <S%H4492><s%> which are in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and caves <S%H4631><s%>, and strong holds <S%H4679><s%>. prevailed: Heb. was strong

And so it was, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> had sown <S%H2232><s%>, that the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%>, and the Amalekites <S%H6002><s%>, and the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>, even they came up <S%H5927><s%> against them;

And they encamped <S%H2583><s%> against them, and destroyed <S%H7843><s%> the increase <S%H2981><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, till thou come <S%H935><s%> unto Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, and left <S%H7604><s%> no sustenance <S%H4241><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>, neither sheep <S%H7716><s%>, nor ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor ass <S%H2543><s%>. sheep: or goat

For they came up <S%H5927><s%> with their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and their tents <S%H168><s%>, and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H935><s%> as <S%H1767><s%> grasshoppers <S%H697><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>; for both they and their camels <S%H1581><s%> were without number <S%H4557><s%>: and they entered <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> was greatly <S%H3966><s%> impoverished <S%H1809><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%>; and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And it came to pass, when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H182><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%>,

That the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a prophet <S%H376><s%> <S%H5030><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, I brought you up <S%H5927><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>; a prophet: Heb. a man a prophet

And I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> you, and drave them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, and gave <S%H5414><s%> you their land <S%H776><s%>;

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto you, I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>; fear <S%H3372><s%> not the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, in whose land <S%H776><s%> ye dwell <S%H3427><s%>: but ye have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>.

And there came <S%H935><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> under an oak <S%H424><s%> which was in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%>, that pertained unto Joash <S%H3101><s%> the Abiezrite <S%H33><s%>: and his son <S%H1121><s%> Gideon <S%H1439><s%> threshed <S%H2251><s%> wheat <S%H2406><s%> by the winepress <S%H1660><s%>, to hide <S%H5127><s%> it from <S%H6440><s%> the Midianites <S%H4080><s%>. Gideon: Gr. Gedeon to hide: Heb. to cause it to flee

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto him, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with thee, thou mighty <S%H1368><s%> man of valour <S%H2428><s%>.

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Oh <S%H994><s%> my Lord <S%H113><s%>, if <S%H3426><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be with us, why then is all this befallen <S%H4672><s%> us? and where be all his miracles <S%H6381><s%> which our fathers <S%H1><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> us of, saying <S%H559><s%>, Did not the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bring us up <S%H5927><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>? but now the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5203><s%> us, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> us into the hands <S%H3709><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> upon him, and said <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> in this thy might <S%H3581><s%>, and thou shalt save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%>: have not I sent <S%H7971><s%> thee?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Oh <S%H994><s%> my Lord <S%H136><s%>, wherewith <S%H4100><s%> shall I save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>? behold, my family <S%H504><s%> <S%H505><s%> is poor <S%H1800><s%> in Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, and I am the least <S%H6810><s%> in my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>. my family: Heb. my thousand is the meanest
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Surely I will be with thee, and thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, If now I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, then shew <S%H6213><s%> me a sign <S%H226><s%> that thou talkest <S%H1696><s%> with me.

Depart <S%H4185><s%> not hence, I pray thee, until I come <S%H935><s%> unto thee, and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> my present <S%H4503><s%>, and set <S%H3240><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> thee. And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will tarry <S%H3427><s%> until thou come again <S%H7725><s%>. present: or, meat offering

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> went in <S%H935><s%>, and made ready <S%H6213><s%> a kid <S%H5795><s%> <S%H1423><s%>, and unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of flour <S%H7058><s%>: the flesh <S%H1320><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> in a basket <S%H5536><s%>, and he put <S%H7760><s%> the broth <S%H4839><s%> in a pot <S%H6517><s%>, and brought it out <S%H3318><s%> unto him under the oak <S%H424><s%>, and presented <S%H5066><s%> it. a kid: Heb. a kid of the goats

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Take <S%H3947><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%>, and lay <S%H3240><s%> them upon this <S%H1975><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%>, and pour out <S%H8210><s%> the broth <S%H4839><s%>. And he did <S%H6213><s%> so.

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the staff <S%H4938><s%> that was in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and touched <S%H5060><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%>; and there rose up <S%H5927><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%>. Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> out of his sight <S%H5869><s%>.

And when Gideon <S%H1439><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> that he was an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Alas <S%H162><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>! for because <S%H3651><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Peace <S%H7965><s%> be unto thee; fear <S%H3372><s%> not: thou shalt not die <S%H4191><s%>.

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> it Jehovahshalom <S%H3073><s%>: unto this day <S%H3117><s%> it is yet in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%> of the Abiezrites <S%H33><s%>. Jehovahshalom: that is, The LORD send peace

And it came to pass the same night <S%H3915><s%>, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Take <S%H3947><s%> thy father's <S%H1><s%> young <S%H6499><s%> bullock <S%H7794><s%>, even the second <S%H8145><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> years old <S%H8141><s%>, and throw down <S%H2040><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> that thy father <S%H1><s%> hath, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> the grove <S%H842><s%> that is by it: even: or, and

And build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> upon the top <S%H7218><s%> of this rock <S%H4581><s%>, in the ordered place <S%H4634><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and offer <S%H5927><s%> a burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%> with the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the grove <S%H842><s%> which thou shalt cut down <S%H3772><s%>. rock: Heb. strong place in the ordered: or, in an orderly manner

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> unto him: and so it was, because he feared <S%H3372><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> household <S%H1004><s%>, and the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, that he could not do <S%H6213><s%> it by day <S%H3119><s%>, that he did <S%H6213><s%> it by night <S%H3915><s%>.

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> arose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, behold, the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> was cast down <S%H5422><s%>, and the grove <S%H842><s%> was cut down <S%H3772><s%> that was by it, and the second <S%H8145><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> was offered <S%H5927><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> that was built <S%H1129><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H7453><s%>, Who hath done <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>? And when they enquired <S%H1875><s%> and asked <S%H1245><s%>, they said <S%H559><s%>, Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>.

Then the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joash <S%H3101><s%>, Bring out <S%H3318><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%>, that he may die <S%H4191><s%>: because he hath cast down <S%H5422><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and because he hath cut down <S%H3772><s%> the grove <S%H842><s%> that was by it.

And Joash <S%H3101><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all that stood <S%H5975><s%> against him, Will ye plead <S%H7378><s%> for Baal <S%H1168><s%>? will ye save <S%H3467><s%> him? he that will plead <S%H7378><s%> for him, let him be put to death <S%H4191><s%> whilst it is yet morning <S%H1242><s%>: if he be a god <S%H430><s%>, let him plead <S%H7378><s%> for himself, because one hath cast down <S%H5422><s%> his altar <S%H4196><s%>.

Therefore on that day <S%H3117><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> him Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let Baal <S%H1168><s%> plead <S%H7378><s%> against him, because he hath thrown down <S%H5422><s%> his altar <S%H4196><s%>. Jerubbaal: that is, Let Baal plead Jerubbesheth: that is, Let the shameful thing plead

Then all the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> and the Amalekites <S%H6002><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and went over <S%H5674><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>.

But the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H3847><s%> upon Gideon <S%H1439><s%>, and he blew <S%H8628><s%> a trumpet <S%H7782><s%>; and Abiezer <S%H44><s%> was gathered <S%H2199><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him. came: Heb. clothed gathered: Heb. called

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> throughout all Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>; who also was gathered <S%H2199><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: and he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto Asher <S%H836><s%>, and unto Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, and unto Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>; and they came up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them. gathered: Heb. called
And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, If thou wilt <S%H3426><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by mine hand <S%H3027><s%>, as thou hast said <S%H1696><s%>,

Behold, I will put <S%H3322><s%> a fleece <S%H1492><s%> of wool <S%H6785><s%> in the floor <S%H1637><s%>; and if the dew <S%H2919><s%> be on the fleece <S%H1492><s%> only, and it be dry <S%H2721><s%> upon all the earth <S%H776><s%> beside, then shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that thou wilt save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by mine hand <S%H3027><s%>, as thou hast said <S%H1696><s%>.

And it was so: for he rose up early <S%H7925><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, and thrust <S%H2115><s%> the fleece <S%H1492><s%> together <S%H2115><s%>, and wringed <S%H4680><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> out of the fleece <S%H1492><s%>, a bowl <S%H5602><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>.

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, Let not thine anger <S%H639><s%> be hot <S%H2734><s%> against me, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> but this once <S%H6471><s%>: let me prove <S%H5254><s%>, I pray thee, but this once <S%H6471><s%> with the fleece <S%H1492><s%>; let it now be dry <S%H2721><s%> only upon the fleece <S%H1492><s%>, and upon all the ground <S%H776><s%> let there be dew <S%H2919><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so that night <S%H3915><s%>: for it was dry <S%H2721><s%> upon the fleece <S%H1492><s%> only, and there was dew <S%H2919><s%> on all the ground <S%H776><s%>.
